name: options
description: The options to display in the combobox.

name: aria-label
description: Accessible label for the combobox input.

name: aria-labelledby
description: ID of the element that labels this combobox.

name: className
description: Additional class name for the input element.

name: color
description: The color scheme of the combobox.

name: defaultValue
description:
The uncontrolled selected value of the combobox when it's initially rendered.

To render a controlled combobox, use the `value` prop instead.

name: emptyMessage
description: Message to display when no options match the input.

name: name
description: Identifies the field when a form is submitted.

name: placeholder
description: Placeholder text when no value is entered.

name: renderOption
description: Custom render function for option items.

name: value
description: The selected value of the combobox. Use when controlled.

name: variant
description: The visual style of the combobox input.
